_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Keys with _else are produced with non-trained Stanford NLP and as such only includes capitalized words. The + designates a segment range. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.
before^mn78:6.3^who_mentioned: Kings, Bandits, Ministers, Armies, Threats, Wars, Food, Drink, Clothes, Beds, Garlands, Fragrances, Family, Vehicles, Villages, Towns, Cities, Countries, Women, Heroes, Street Talk, Well Talk, Departed, Motley Talk, Tales of Land and Sea, Being Reborn
before^mn78:6.3^where: Jeta's Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika's monastery, Mallikā's single-halled monastery
where: Jeta's Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika's monastery, Mallikā's single-halled monastery
